title: The Adoration of the Magi
description: The Adoration of the Magi; Master of the Llangattock Epiphany (Flemish, active about 1450 - 1460); Ghent (bound), Belgium; 1450s; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 26.4 x 18.4 cm (10 3/8 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 7, fol. 88v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
